string-array.name: complaintanonymity
string-array.item: Always show my details when submitting complaints
Always submit new complaints anonymously/without my details

string-array.name: commmentanonymity
string-array.item: Always show my details when posting comments
Always post comments anonymously/without my details

string-array.name: userrequests
string-array.item: Allow other users to send me requests
Do not allow other users to send me requests
